data.description: a SAX parser for TWiki text
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Text::TWikiFormat::SAX is slightly based on Text::WikiFormat::SAX
    and implements the same functionality for parsing TWiki texts as
    Text::WikiFormat::SAX does for parsing Wiki texts, though TWiki and
    Wiki rules deffers greatly. Currently Text::TWikiFormat::SAX
    supports the most of TWiki formatting rules and produces well-formed
    XML.
